pr_title: KYLIN-4820 Can not auto set spark resources configurations when building cube

timeline.message:
KYLIN-4820 Can not auto set spark resources configurations when building cube

Root cause:
Currently there are some spark resources configurations set in the kylin-default.properties, so these configurations will override the ones set by Kylin automatically.

KYLIN-4820 Can not auto set spark resources configurations when building cube

Root cause:
Currently there are some spark resources configurations set in the kylin-default.properties, so these configurations will override the ones set by Kylin automatically.

timeline.bodyText: If it is possible to merge two configuration kylin.engine.spark.task-impact-instance-enabled and kylin.engine.spark.task-impact-instance-enabled?
timeline.author: hit-lacus
